projects.name: MAUI Docker + macOS Containers
projects.description: Docker images and macOS VMs for MAUI development/building/testing.

projects.name: MAUI Virtual List View
projects.description: A virtualized ListView control for .NET MAUI to support simple, fast, multi-templated, uneven item sized lists by not adding too many bells and whistles and using an adapter pattern data source.

projects.name: ZXing.Net.MAUI
projects.description: Barcode scanning and generation for .NET MAUI applications
